approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF NFS server. This process is manual and time-consuming.

requirements.description: Create a portal/dashboard for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Provide access to the portal for V-KYC team leads and Process Managers.
Display recordings searchable by LAN ID.
Allow users to upload a file (Excel or text) with up to 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
Display results of bulk download request in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
Implement pagination for the table displaying bulk download results (10 records per page).
Limit the number of records downloaded at once to 10.
The recording shall be visible if searched by LAN.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Display recordings with relevant metadata (date, month, year).
Bulk download functionality via file upload (CSV/TXT).
Display download results in a table with pagination.
Download all recordings (limited to 10 at a time).
non_functional_requirements: Access restricted to Team Leads and Process Managers.
System should be available during business hours.
success_criteria: Portal is accessible to authorized users.
Users can successfully search and download recordings.
Bulk download functionality works as expected.
Recordings are readily available for audit purposes.
constraints: Recordings are stored on LTF NFS server.
File upload format for bulk download is CSV/TXT.
Maximum 50 LAN IDs per file upload.
assumptions: The NFS server is accessible and functional.
The necessary APIs are available to retrieve recordings.
The V-KYC team has the required infrastructure to access the portal.
risks: Network issues affecting access to the NFS server.
Data security concerns related to recording access.

recommendations: Include details about data security and access controls.
Specify the performance requirements for the portal (e.g., response time).

recommendations_for_completion: Define specific security measures for data access and storage.
Establish performance benchmarks for the portal's functionality.
